[enemy]
# Cultist
type=enemy
location=7,11,1,1
category=cultist
level=2,2
number=1,1

[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=event
location=0,0,7,1
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/laurelia.txt,74,142

[event]
# Teleport to Snow2
type=event
location=31,9,1,1
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/snow2.txt,1,9

[event]
# Require Juggernaut Talisman
type=event
location=24,14,1,1
activate=on_trigger
intramap=24,24
msg=You need the Juggernaut Talisman to proceed!
requires_not_status=fulljugg
